Procedure.description:
PROCEDURE PURPOSE: to execute MTG-I Yaw Flip
PROCEDURE VERSION: 4.0 RESPONSIBILITY: Arturo Del Foco LAST MODIFIED DATE: 09.03.2023
CHANGE HISTORY: Version 4.0 (AdF - 09.03.2023) Change History: - Copied from FOM procedure N_SAT_I600 Version 9 - 15/04/2022 - Procedure Description field updated according to EUMETSAT template; - GeoSAR management removed, as per PST recommendation provided via email by ESA (Emilia Barbagallo), on Tuesday 7 March 2023 11:12, Subject: RE: Yaw Flip Manoeuvre preparation; - introduced IF steps to execute PL management only if needed: no action if PL is in Wait or lower macro-mode; - introduced variables to record the PL status at the start of the procedure, in order to restore it after the Yaw Flip manoeuvre execution; - introduced Operator interactions to provide the oprion to skip FCI or LI calibrations; - FCI to Wait procedure: call to N_SAT_I510 replaced by call to N_FCI_I205; - Steps executing PF and PDD activities replaced by a call to EUM version of N_SAT_I600, that was updated to manage only PF and KAT gain setting Ka antenna re-pointing; - FCI to Observation procedure: call to N_SAT_I500 replaced by call to N_FCI_I800; - Added procedure arguments to populate N_FCI_I800 from parent procedure N_SAT_I800; - Fixed typos in procedure arguments related to N_FCI_I800.
PROCEDURE OBJECTIVES: This procedure is used to execute all the activities foreseen for a Yaw Flip manoeuvre, including PL management if required.
PROCEDURE OVERVIEW: - check the Pre-conditions applicable to MTG-I satellites prior to the execution of the Yaw Flip manoeuver - if in Observation macro-mode, command the FCI and LI to Wait macro-mode - If KAT ON, set Ka Gain to minimum - execute Yaw-Flip manoeuver from NOM and back to NOM + RWOL + Ka repoint - if KAT ON, Restore Ka Nominal Gain - if in Observation mode at the start of this procedure, command the FCI and LI from Wait to Observation macro-mode - (if required, execute FCI and LI calibrations)
PROCEDURE PRE-CONDITIONS: The satellite is in NOM/FPM or SPM/FPM
PROCEDURE CONSTRAINTS All TCs existing in the MTL at the beginning of execution of the procedure are deleted. A pre-condition check informs the Operator if there MTL is not empty at the start of the procedure.
SPACECRAFT CONFIGURATION Start of Procedure: - SAT mode: NOM or SBM - AOCS mode: FPM - AOCS S/S: nominal configuration for FPM - DHS S/S: nominal configuration - TTC S/S: nominal configuration - EPS S/S: nominal configuration - PDD S/S: any - TCS S/S: nominal configuration - UPS S/S: nominal configuration - FCI mode: any - LI mode: any
End of Procedure: - SAT mode: NOM or SBM - AOCS mode: FPM - AOCS S/S: nominal configuration for FPM - DHS S/S: nominal configuration - TTC S/S: nominal configuration - EPS S/S: nominal configuration - PDD S/S: as at procedure start - TCS S/S: nominal configuration - UPS S/S: nominal configuration - FCI mode: as at procedure start - LI mode: as at procedure start
GROUND SEGMENT CONFIGURATION: N/A
Procedure.title: MTG-I Yaw-Flip
Procedure.author: delfoco_OPRE
Procedure.hierarchy: Child Procedures: Default:NomLI::N_LIR_I506 called by steps: P.2.A1.A4 Default::N_FCI_I205 called by steps: P.2.A2.A4 Default::N_SAT_I600 called by steps: P.3.A1 Default:NomFCI::N_FCI_I150 called by steps: P.4.A1.A3.A2 Default:NomSysSAT::N_FCI_I800 called by steps: P.4.A1.A4 Default:NomLI::N_LIR_I002 called by steps: P.5.A1.A2, P.5.A1.B2.A3 Default:NomLI::N_LIR_I504 called by steps: P.5.A1.A4.A3.A1, P.5.A1.A4.A4.A1, P.5.A1.A4.A5.A1 Default:NomLI::N_LIR_I503 called by steps: P.5.A1.A5

ProcedureArgument.name: SCAE_SLOT
ProcedureArgument.description: Index of the Scan Law ID slot in SCAE

ProcedureArgument.name: SETUP_MS
ProcedureArgument.description: Do you want to setup the Mission Scenario?

ProcedureArgument.name: SETUP_REPSEQ
ProcedureArgument.description: Do you want to setup the REPSEQ?

ProcedureArgument.name: SETUP_WP
ProcedureArgument.description: Update FCI WP - Rally and IR Calibration Periodicity

ProcedureArgument.name: FCI_GRS_ID
ProcedureArgument.description: FCI Ground-assigned identifier of the Repeat Sequence FCI_RS_ID

ProcedureArgument.name: MISS_SCEN
ProcedureArgument.description: Mission Scenario slot ID in the SMU/MM

step.title: Confirm SAT mode is NOM or SBM
Confirm no TCs stored in MTL

StepBody.message: The MTL is not empty! All TCs currently existing in the MTL will be deleted by procedure N_SYS_0035. Contact the SOE to get the go-ahead to proceed with the execution of this procedure.

step.title: LI macro-mode will be set to Wait

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode will be set to Wait

step.title: N_LIR_I506: Switch LI from OPER/CALIB to WAIT mode

StepBody.title: Switch LI from OPER/CALIB to WAIT mode

step.title: LI macro-mode already in Wait or lower

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode already in Wait or lower

step.title: FCI macro-mode will be set to Wait

StepBody.message: FCI macro-mode will be set to Wait

argument.name: END_MODE
argument.description: FCI mode at end of de-activation

step.title: FCI macro-mode already in Wait or lower

StepBody.message: FCI macro-mode already in Wait or lower

step.title: Execute Yaw-Flip manoeuver from NOM and back to NOM + RWOL + Ka repoint

argument.name: DATE_TREF_H
argument.description: Execution date and time of Yaw Flip

argument.name: FCI_WP_TREF
argument.description: Coarse OBT (1s resolution) to start the FCI Work Plan execution

argument.name: START_TIME_S
argument.description: CUC coarse time when to start the repeat sequence

argument.name: FCI_GSSL_ID
argument.description: FCI Ground-assigned identifier of the Simplified Scan Law associated to FCI Scan Law FCI_SL_ID

argument.name: FCI_GRS_ID
argument.description: FCI Ground-assigned identifier of the Repeat Sequence FCI_RS_ID

argument.name: FCI_WP_TOFFSET
argument.description: Time offset with 1 ms resolution from the reference 1 Hz PPS

argument.name: START_TIME_M
argument.description: Minor Frame count to start repeat sequence

step.title: Confirm FCI was Operational before Yaw Flip

StepBody.message: FCI macro-mode is set back to OPERATIONAL

step.title: Set FCIcalibr to execute FCI calibration

StepBody.message: Select true to perform FCI calibration; select false to skip it.

step.title: FCI SCAN Encoders Calibration will be executed

StepBody.message: FCI SCAN Encoders Calibration will be executed

step.title: N_FCI_I150: Perform FCI SCAN Encoders Calibration
FCI SCAN Encoders Calibration will NOT be executed

StepBody.message: FCI SCAN Encoders Calibration will NOT be executed

step.title: N_FCI_I800: FCI Activation WAIT to OBSERVATION

argument.name: SCAE_SLOT
argument.description: Index of the Scan Law ID slot in SCAE

argument.name: SETUP_MS
argument.description: Do you want to setup the Mission Scenario?

argument.name: SETUP_REPSEQ
argument.description: Do you want to setup the REPSEQ?

argument.name: SETUP_WP
argument.description: Update FCI WP - Rally and IR Calibration Periodicity

argument.name: FCI_GRS_ID
argument.description: FCI Ground-assigned identifier of the Repeat Sequence FCI_RS_ID

argument.name: MISS_SCEN
argument.description: Mission Scenario slot ID in the SMU/MM

step.title: FCI macro-mode left to WAIT or lower

StepBody.message: FCI macro-mode is left unchanged (WAIT or lower)

step.title: Confirm LI was Operational before Yaw Flip

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode is set back to OPERATIONAL

step.title: Set LIcalibr to execute LI calibration

StepBody.message: Select true to perform LI calibration; select false to skip it.
LI Calibrations will be executed

step.title: LI Dark Conditions for calibration OK ?

StepBody.message: LI Dark Conditions for calibration OK ?

step.title: N_LIR_I504: LI calibration - Dark acquisitions (offset and readout noise)
LI Calibration 1 will NOT be executed

StepBody.message: LI Calibration 1 will NOT be executed - PAF argument not configured

step.title: N_LIR_I504: LI calibration - Dark acquisitions (dark signal)
LI Calibration 2 will NOT be executed

StepBody.message: LI Calibration 2 will NOT be executed - PAF argument not configured

step.title: LI Calibration 3 will NOT be executed

StepBody.message: LI Calibration 3 will NOT be executed - PAF argument not configured

step.title: LI Calibrations will NOT be executed

StepBody.message: LI Calibrations will NOT be executed

step.title: N_LIR_I503: Switch LI from WAIT to OPERATIONAL mode

StepBody.title: Switch LI from WAIT to OPERATIONAL mode

step.title: LI macro-mode left to WAIT or lower

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode is left unchanged (WAIT or lower)

step.title: LI macro-mode left to WAIT or lower & Yaw-Flips status update

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode is left unchanged (WAIT or lower); Yaw-Flips status is updated according to current configuration.

step.title: LI macro-mode left to WAIT or lower & Yaw-Flips status unchanged

StepBody.message: LI macro-mode (WAIT or lower) and Yaw-Flips status are left unchanged.
